course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Construction Materials
course.description: Properties of engineering materials and their relation to the internal structure of materials; includes physical properties of construction materials like portland cement concrete, asphalt, polymers, ferrous metals and non-ferrous metals.

reviews.author: CIVIL小薯 ._.
reviews.comment_content: 主要講唔同materials ge properties。本身應該係一科對civil仔幾實用ge course，但因為professor ge關係，你明的。
reviews.comment_teaching:
相信大家都會覺得ust ge professor 大部分都好好人，但CIVL2810 個professor就唔係咁講喇。呢個course ge professor 博學多才，好多時唔似civil仔們一般見識，所以講d野都較難明白。 到左填SFQ ge 時間，大家都會把握機會e爆呢d professor。但古語有云：「方丈份人好小器架」。得罪李X津，份卷亂咁出。冇錯，呢個course ge professor雖然睇起上里好好人，但暗地裏密謀一個驚天大陰謀。只要觸動方丈神經，就等pk。 所以我在這裡呼籲大家，就算想解心頭之恨， 俾曬全c就好收手，唔好貪一時痛快俾曬全e，更加唔好寫「ta教得比佢更加好」類似ge說話，出左呢句，唔止自己pk, ta都會被人鬧到pk。愛自己，愛他人，做個精叻評分人，唔好做到以上任何一點，等SFQ評分最低紀錄保持者可以退一退落里，開心番一次。今年ge civil仔就做齊以上兩項，所以某小氣鬼嬲嬲豬(TA話ge)，結果final場面十分壯觀，一份3小時ge final paper可以出現40條true false， 30條mc，7條有subquestion ge 長問題，就算open book都難做得曬，打破左呢一科一路以來ge輕鬆印象。最後再一次呼籲，比SFQ之前一定一定要三思。

TA 幾好人，雖然英文都唔算太好，但真係好過professor，可以明白佢講咩。

Sor for 1999
reviews.comment_grading:
TA就話minimum就B，我諗佢ge意思係全部人都B(好似係）

30% lab report + presentation
20% assignment
50% final
Bonus 5% quiz
reviews.comment_workload: 有6份group lab report, 幾份assignment, 一個present(可以hea) 同一個open book final exam

reviews.author: BV VT
reviews.title: The Best Prof in HKUST
reviews.comment_content:
As this is material course the content and concept of this course is relatively difficult and complicated . As material development is so fast therefore,prof only want us to understand the basic principle of material .

Prof organize the course very well you may get confuse at the beginning but later you will find out that the content are well linked

Course Topic  :
Mechanical behaviour of materials
Steel
Wood
Concrete :
aggregate
water
workability consistency and cohesiveness,
CRM: pfa, ggba and csf
creep and shrinkage strain
Polymer and polymeric composites:
Pavement materials
reviews.comment_teaching: Prof Leung is the Best Prof in HKUST. He is very experienced in material and industrial .Always link the course content with the real world so you will be understand how to apply the knowledge . He understand student difficulty and willing to help (extend the deadline of HW and lab report) .He will  ans email and willing to make an appointment with student to ans question .最重要係可以用廣東話問問題!!!!.prof is also so funny always tell joke in class.
reviews.comment_grading:
Homework (5)-25%
Laboratory Reports (4) –20%
Laboratory Presentation –5%
Final Examination –50%
No mid-term
–Exam questions will be of similar style to homework and tutorial examples/questions

The final examination consist MC (the last ten is AL level type with five choices )( so difficult) and long question (homework and tutorial example consist 80%)

The grading is an uncertainty since the final exam consist half of the total grade.

Even in the same lab group and same hw score there have large difference in the result grade  (A+, A , B- , B)

I personally think the grading is better than other course so no worry.
reviews.comment_workload:
2 x (1 hr lecture) and 1 hr tutorial class  in a week both are teach by prof leung  (even there is no attendance  I think it is really a must to attend the tutorial class because the content is very different to lecture and difficult you can not understand by your own it is also very useful for hw )

4 laboratory session (8-10 people in a group so the workload is not large ) reports  need to submitted within 10 days

and one laboratory presentation (you may choose one lab test you are interested in )

Total 5 homework  .The homework is so difficult to finished  however you can always ask for help (it is not possible to finish homework without source  ).

No mid-term exam is good in some extend  however,that means you need to memonize all the content for final examination.(prof will cut down some topic )

reviews.author: SQ Flyer
reviews.title: very comprehensive material course, Concrete is the key to success
reviews.comment_content:
Lecture Content:
material behavior
(elasticity, plasticity, creep, time-dependent behavior)
fracture mechanics
(the above parts involve heavily on mechanics and new concepts, difficult i would say)

concrete and cement
admixture and crm
aggregates
fresh concrete
early age concrete
concrete deformation, strength and durability
steel
polymer
wood
pavement

Tutorial Content:
material selection
time-dependent behavior
fracture mechanics
concrete applications(focus on gel-space development, aggregates water adjustment, concrete shrinkage and creep, concrete design)
polymer and composite behavior
reviews.comment_teaching:
Chris Leung 係Local Prof 教左呢個Course都已經好多年 本身Research 方面係 Concrete 同Fracture Mechanics  呢兩個大Topic 用左大部分時間教
睇得出Chris 好有耐性好用心去將唔同 material behaviors 概念仔細甘樣present  算係教得有條理 稍微複雜概念會加以畫圖解釋
我自己覺得Concrete 同後面steel, polymer, wood, pavement 個Part 教得最好 Lecture 會cover qualitative concepts 多 比你有個Big Picture 知道不同material 過程的演化同實質用途
基本上Lecture 有問題提出 Chris 好welcome 甚至base on 問題再講下實際上行業用途 呢點我appreciate  （除左又係gary li 成日又亂入做問題兒童 搞到Chris 有幾次真係發火閙人）

Tutorial 每次都係Chris 親自教 内容同lecture 有好大分別 會講更多深入的Topic 同較爲quantitative example 呢Part 都好重要畢竟考試有部分題目係base on tutorial 内容引申去問 基本上concrete 個到由cement hydration, aggregates, fresh concrete, concrete shrinkage 到concrete design 考試佔分好多 但係相對概念無感難
Tutorial最好一定要上或者睇返片

至於Lab就係唔同TA輪流教 會有Demo同落手做 基本上每次有問題Email TA會解答得好詳細
reviews.comment_grading:
Assessment Rubics:
Assignments * 5 25%
Lab *5 + presentation 25%
Final exam open book 50%

基本上個個assignment同lab 個分都超過90 唯一一次係Lab 5 mean only 75 Final變得好重要
Prof 話派Grade會大概睇你overall performance 同以前大概分數個grade做比較唔會死拉curve

今年Final 我覺得比上年Online final難 頭一二題問超多proof無幾多個人會識做 得fracture mechanics 無感難 後面問一堆concrete同其他material題目基本上都係要熟書同魯芬急轉彎唔係會做唔切 上一年份paper就相對長但問得直接 要注意係notes裏面的算式最好理解個概念 考試會問到點用同有相關計數題 不同圖表同reasoning要清楚了解 考試吾識做嘗試盡量寫steps 展示到你個思路Logic 出泥博分

my performance:
Assignment: 100 100 100 100 97
Lab: 95 96 97 99 80
Final: Unknown

以爲會B range 畢竟好多題目Proof都唔識做 short questions 字眼都唔係完全Hit中有足分

但係最後意料之外有A 算係非常好
比起3310 Lambros 上堂坐火箭要好得多
reviews.comment_workload:
workload 我會比C 注意呢一科係無Midterm
lecture tutorial 係2+1 hrs  Lab 有5次 今個Semester每次Lab得一個鐘到

頭一個月未有Lab做 workload 吾算大 但係time-dependent behavior of materials 同fracture mechanics 内容相對難 （據我所知其他U Civil Engineering Material Course 無UST感深 同埋無呢Dtopic）就感睇Notes 唔會明 考試題目可以出得好難 要擺多時間嘗試理解下因爲吾係有太多reference book 有相關例子内容

跟著到十月十一月每個星期都有Lab做 每次做不同concrete test report每個人做少少題目同計數就得 無豬隊友就基本上好快搞掂
到十一月尾每個人做一個presentation講下Lab finding 跟住有問題follow up 基本上預備幾頁slides就無太大難度

assignment有五份 問題相對難做好多時都係做proof或者唔係太直接的計數題 最好有source幫幫忙去學習下

其餘就係自己溫lecture/tutorial notes textbook readings
注意notes内容比較 to the point 睇埋書會更好
同埋final儘早溫習 畢竟内容唔少 需要時間去理解個脈絡 尤其係concrete呢部分問好多 後面不同material問題都問得唔係特別直接但係讀過就基本上都會答到一大部分題目

Recommended Textbook:
Construction Materials Their Nature & Behavior by John Illston
Civil Engineering Materials by Jackson

reviews.author: hihihiismeagain
reviews.title: 無midterm 結果final一po過開唔切sem
reviews.comment_content:
都係講下唔同type的material
集中講concrete 同steel
reviews.comment_teaching:
好有心教 ge professor
professor同TA都好好人
好welcome學生落堂問野
講解得好清晰，powerpoint之外仲有notes比你溫書
有lecture video但係他教得幾好 唔想走堂
tutorial由professor上 幾值得上
但係溫書發現tutorial同assignment係唔關事，tutorial係lecture無咩提的野，tutorial好似多左堂甘，同埋final都考唔少tutorial ge 野，唔似其他科tutorial係教hw
reviews.comment_grading:
exam schedule 太chisin
一完midterm break
星期六4：30pm 考3730 跟著個
星期一8：30就考2810
跟著無midterm的關係，臨到final先開sem 所以係完全開唔切sem
星期日7：00起身 溫到2點頂唔住 ，有d fd通左成晚頂
所以大家記住及早溫書la
無midterm更加容易hea or陣係顧住溫其他科
溫得個一日書入去考 好多MC都唔sure同d數都係亂甘計
但係d 題目好似tutorial同hw，其實教ge野幾有趣，溫書個時好開心，可惜唔夠時間溫書
最後拿B算係甘
reviews.comment_workload:
assignment 有source輕鬆 但係幾難做，抄完理解左好耐都唔明，溫書要預d時間去理解hw
lab report有source 輕鬆
lab present 好hea

reviews.author: thanos
reviews.title: Lots of content, many stuffs to memorize but good grade course
reviews.comment_content:
There are lecture presentations
lecture notes
tutorial notes
Many many factual stuffs that need to be recited

Concepts are difficult in the first month about the mechanical behaviors
reviews.comment_teaching:
He is very nice and almost after every lecture there are ppl asking him questions
Utilize all time for his teaching including tutorials, in which he teaches new concepts and do some sample questions which are similar to the homework and exam
Try not to skip his lectures I guess
reviews.comment_grading:
Grading is good
Homework 25%
5 Lab report + presentation 25%
Final exam 50%

Most ppl have source to the homework and lab so there is very small standard deviations and high means (~90%)
GET yourself some sources will help a lot

But the mean of final is approximately 40%
Don't panik if don't understand the contents
Revised for 3 days before final
Final grade: A
reviews.comment_workload:
In oct and nov every week a lab and report to be handed in
but 8 ppl a group so it's fine
try to make sure everyone done his part then will be all fine
Presentation lasts only 3 mins, can read ppt so it's easy
Assignments are hard but he would go through some questions in tutorials so it's still manageable
Do spend some more time in revising for final exam cuz the standard deviation is much greater

reviews.author: HKUST-1
reviews.title: 溫一晚都可以B-嘅course
reviews.comment_content:
冇上過堂
最後8個鐘先溫tutorial solutions
唔知學咗啲乜

lab方面隊友carry晒5個lab, 唔使點做
lab: 95,70,58,100,85
hw: 40,35,40,30,40
lab presentation: 19.5/20
final: 38/100 佢話slighty低過median

lab presentation用咗5分鐘打起份ppt即場爆肚，個TA會問你一兩條問題，記得整得簡潔啲，同埋講嘢唔好成個毒燃咁lur晒啲data同point出嚟，俾啲起承轉合！諗下你DSE english speaking果陣點樣屈隔離個4條友機咁屈個TA機就得

final: 40分mc 60分計數

mc全撞 計數用翻2120學過嘅嘢 考3個鐘 坐咗2個鐘出翻嚟 廢事俾個TA知我交份接近白卷嘅answer book
reviews.comment_teaching:
冇上過堂
答你唔到
Final係我第一次見professor真身
聽講幾nice
我send email問分佢好似唔使半個鐘就覆咗我 勁快
所以我俾個A佢

啲TA都唔差 問佢lab點做佢地會教
reviews.comment_grading:
睇上面content

我覺得咁都有B-真係謝天謝地謝天華

好過同期嘅lambros多多聲

多謝牙chris咁樣都派2.7俾我

真係幾靚龜
reviews.comment_workload:
一個sem total
5份hw
5份grp lab report
1份lab presentation
1個final

係個final chur咗少少，用咗我一罐energy drink嘅quota，其他嘢好簡單，記得搵師兄carry，得final 係challenging

total time used on this course:
1hr/hw *5 + 30min/report *5 + 5min on lab presentation + 8 hrs on studying final + 2 hours on exam

= 17.58 hr

所以我俾A

reviews.author: 準雷
reviews.title: 讀得好in-depth但靚grade既material course
reviews.comment_content:
Part I: General Mechanical Behaviour
呢part無論係concept定係計數都係最難
所以會教得慢D
1. Introduction and Elasticity
2. Plasticity
3. Creep
4. Fracture & Fatigue

Part II: Concrete
呢part會好仔細講concrete多方面既野
背野最多但計數比較簡單同易明
5. Concrete and Cement
6. Admixtures and CRM
7. Aggregates
8. Fresh Concrete
9. Early Age
10. Concrete Deformation
11. Concrete Strength
12. Concrete Durability

Part III: Other Materials
呢part會講其他材料
背野都多但計數少
13. Steel Corrosion
14. Steel
15. Polymer & Composites
16. Wood (Final Exam 唔考)
17. Pavement
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof. LEUNG 教得幾好
Lecture會好仔細咁講每一樣野既concept
同埋背後既原理
問佢問題都會好有耐性答
可以用廣東話問
Tutorial都係佢親自操刀教
會教同lecture好唔同既野
例如計數同埋MC題點樣做
對Homework同Final Exam會比較重要
因為考試題型會同tutorial好似
reviews.comment_grading:
Homework (25%):
HW1: 40/40 (Mean 37.91)
HW2: 38.5/40 (Mean 34.19)
HW3: 40/40 (Mean 36.21)
HW4: 40/40 (Mean 35.49)
HW5: 38/40 (Mean 38.67)

Lab (20%):
Lab1: 90/100 (Mean 86.3)
Lab2: 85/100 (Mean 72.1)
Lab3: 90/100 (Mean 85.56)
Lab4: 100/100 (Mean 97.94)
Lab5: 90/100 (Mean 85.37)

Presentation (5%): 14/20

Final Exam (Closed-book, 50%):
40/100  (Median: 39)
(MC題40分, 計數同discussion 60分)

Overall: 66.2625%
Final Grade: B+

考試都幾難 自己唔算溫得熟
所以都算幾好grade
reviews.comment_workload:
有5份Homework
題目同tutorial似
所以用多少少時間試做都問題不大

有5次lab要上
事後一個星期交一次lab report
不過一組有8-9個人
所以每人做少少就得
但要確保無free rider同埋要做final checking
之後會有一次3分鐘既presentation
一人講一個lab既test
之後TA會問問題
問題都有少少刁鑽
所以要確保自己熟個test既野

但溫Final Exam而言
因為無Midterm Exam
Lecture + Tutorial夾埋都好多野要溫同背
而且要溫得熟
因為MC同Discussion Question都問得幾仔細
計數題要熟個做法
尤其是Part I
所以一定要預早D溫

reviews.author: CyrusL
reviews.comment_content:
[Syllabus]
Basic behavior of engineering materials:
Linear elasticity, plasticity, creep and fracture/fatigue

Concrete science and technology:
(i) properties of cement and aggregates
(ii) cement replacement materials and admixtures
(iii) fresh properties of concrete
(iv) concrete at early age
(v) hardened concrete: strength and deformation behaviour
(vi) concrete durability

Steel:
Types of steel, welding, corrosion protection

Polymer and composites:
Classes of polymers, fiber reinforced polymers, applications in civil engineering

Wood:
Wood structure and properties, wood products for structural application

Bituminous pavement materials:
Properties of bituminous materials and requirements for pavement construction
----
After starting off with basic knowledge about the behavior of materials under stress, the course goes into detail on selected materials, with a lot of emphasis on concrete, since it is a widely used construction material especially in HK.

The tutorials are taught by the professor as well. They cover additional content that is barely mentioned in the lectures and serve to further enrich your knowledge about the topic.

Apart from lectures and tutorials, there are also laboratory sessions, which revolve around the topic of concrete testing. This involves mixing concrete and later conducting the various tests on the concrete we have made. At the end of the semester, each group would have to present their findings to the others in their session.

Important Note: Since the laboratory courses involve dealing with concrete, you need to wear safety shoes in order to participate in the laboratory sessions (which take attendance). The ones you have used in CIVL 2020 will do.
reviews.comment_teaching:
The professor does a great job at explaining things during the lectures and tutorials, using demos when necessary. The only critique I have is that the PowerPoints are very wordy and have little color - they might as well be summary notes for the course.

If the lectures and tutorials are not enough, the professor has also uploaded his own notes as well as some textbook chapters on Canvas for our reference. I personally read them all as part of my revision and found them just as useful as re-watching the lecture videos.

The TAs in the laboratory sessions have put in considerable effort and are helpful in general, but their instructions were occasionally unclear.
reviews.comment_grading:
[Grading Scheme]
Homework: 25%
Laboratory Reports + Presentation*: 25%
Final Exam: 50%

*The presentation was cancelled this semester.
----
The final exam covers all topics, including the content in the lectures and tutorials, but not the laboratory sessions. It is designed to be both comprehensive and in-depth, so the difficulty is relatively high.

Due to the cancellation of face-to-face sessions this semester, the professor provided a special arrangement which gave us the choice of either taking an open-book online exam at the original time with P/F grades, or taking an closed-book on-campus exam during the start of Spring term with A-F grades (even though that finally turned into an open-book online exam due to the coronavirus outbreak).

To avoid being unfair to those who chose the second option, the professor mentioned that he would use the scores from last year as a reference when determining students' grades. Judging from the reviews last year, it was pretty good. Personally, I got an A after choosing the second option, though I have no idea what my scores are.
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload consists of 5 assignments (individual), 5 lab reports (group work) and the lab presentation (cancelled).

Each assignment would take you 1-2 hours, while the lab reports and mostly just involve filling in the blanks with data and doing some simple calculations with them, and therefore would take around 1-2  man-hours.

reviews.author: MECH19XX
reviews.comment_content:
(1) Basic Material Behavior- Effects of time and repeated loading, Creep, Fatigue
(This chapter is explained based on CIVL2120, it is relatively harder than other chapters)

(2) Concrete
(3) Other Construction Materials (Wood, Polymer, Steel)
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof. Leung is expertise in materials and he explains things clearly. He is patient and would share some personal stories that could relate materials to our daily lives. Pretty interesting huh.

The prof would also be in charge of the tutorials, nature is quite different from the lectures. The lecture is theoretically based whereas the tutorials are problem-solving based.
reviews.comment_grading:
Homework (5)-25%
Laboratory Reports (4) –20%
Laboratory Presentation –5%
Final Examination –50%
No mid-term–Exam questions will be of similar style to homework and tutorial examples/questions

So I handed in all the homework and labs. Homework full mark and lab+ presentation probably near full mark.
The final exam is not easy.

Honestly, I have no idea on my performance in the final, I got B- at the end.
reviews.comment_workload:
Homework same as source, you need them as a reference. The tutorials would also have similar questions. Don't skip tutorials!

No midterm, the final exam (40 MCs, some calculations) counts 50% towards the final grade.

There are 4 labs (mixing concrete, slump test etc.) Basically, you group yourselves within the same LA group. Beware of freeriders!! Tell the TAs if some ppl never do the reports.

There is an individual presentation after all labs. You have to introduce 1 of the tests you have done to the TAs. The TA would ask you one question after the presentation.

reviews.author: DaveFok
reviews.comment_content: the content is quite useful tbh. however, the course covers too much. this gives impression to students that all material are irrelevant
reviews.comment_teaching:
not bad, but also not that good
the professor always teach really tough stuff, however , most of those will not be tested in the final exam. except for those he specify
reviews.comment_grading:
large B range
open book, note for exam, prepare to print tons of materials
reviews.comment_workload:
overall light workload, 2 to 3 hw. lab are 9 ppl for a group so the workload for lab is relatively very small
2 to 3 in class quiz, for attendance only

reviews.author: QWE
reviews.title: 自學先係王道
reviews.comment_content:
講下唔同material 唔同property
計數我覺得黎黎去去都係個啲
fact比較多 要花多好多時間去睇,去分清楚
reviews.comment_teaching:
上左頭兩堂後面就走曬
口音太嚴重 唔係跟ppt講個啲差唔多完全聽唔明咁濟

有3-4個quiz 上唔上堂見仁見智
不過TA講到明 : make sure you have friends
大家明啦
reviews.comment_grading:
all in final 無出分
所以都唔知好唔好grade

FINAL份卷有MC/TF, 但係份卷問題太多
就算open notes都唔會搵得切
TF 起碼撞一半是常識
有一條LQ係照抄 輕鬆袋10分
仲有一兩條係轉下數字/問法
reviews.comment_workload:
基本上每個星期都會有lab 7-9人一組
有幾個lab仲係齋企等出result 好悶可以冗
最大既workload應該係final前print 曬所有tutor TA比既material
有source就更好

reviews.author: youknowwho123
reviews.title: A bit disaster, but turns out good
reviews.comment_content:
As mentioned by others, not going to repeat.
However, it can be generally split into structure, concrete and material.
Structure part involve SIMPLE calculations, but DIFFICULT concepts. Therefore, I think it was difficult.

Concrete part involve a little bit of chemistry, but generally just memorize is ok.

Material part... well just memorize la. You get nothing to do.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Lol I only attended first few lectures, then I skipped all.

However, I attended all tutorials because I got nothing to do on Friday morning. (just kidding) It is because tutorials will teach you something which won't be included in lecture notes, such as calculations. You will need to use them in hw and exams.

I think both profs are great. They host their tutorial sessions by themselves.

However, the TAs were another disaster.
reviews.comment_grading:
HW 25% me full marks
Lab report + presentation: 25%
Final 50% unknown
Final: 40%MC (mainly concepts),  60%LQ (mainly calculations)

Overall: A
Although it was a disaster when I was preparing the final, it turns out quite good :)
reviews.comment_workload:
Quite heavy workload, especially the HW is difficult. However, you can still direct copy it if you have sources. I suggest you to understand what is going on b4 you copy it. :)

Lab report. Difficult == Again la, be careful of freeriders and trash teammates. You will be assigned into groups with random ppl, so just pure luck.

Presentation: on9 TA will ask you on9 questions ==. He asked me about the actual size of the aggregates while the lab manual only mentioned that it is coarse aggregates. How can I answer your nonsense question ==. I just pissed off and tell him I don't know. Make good use of your SFQ:)

Exam: umm... I think it will be better to have midterm exam for this course. It is because the course covered a lot of content. Although Christopher provided a topic list for us, we still confused about which part is important. Moreover, I think midterm will provide you a chance to practice what you have learnt.

reviews.author: Watermelon
reviews.comment_content:
1. Basic Material Behavior
2. Concrete
3. Other Construction Materials
- Steel
- Polymers and polymeric composites
- Wood
reviews.comment_teaching:
唔上堂都得。
好悶，內容亦都唔係話一聽就一定明白。
reviews.comment_grading:
HW: 25%
Lab report: 20%
Lab presentation: 5%
Final exam: 50%

/

HW: 96.5/100 (mean: ~92.7/100)
Lab report: 96/100
Lab presentation: unknown
Final exam: unknown

Overall: A
reviews.comment_workload:
功課: 建議攞source
Lab: 睇下你嘅groupmate如何，佢哋唔多做嘢嘅話，咁你就要加油
Final: 佔50%，要好好溫書！！！

reviews.author: NCTROLL
reviews.title: Advanced Content of CIVL2120
reviews.comment_content:
A deeper understanding of civl2120(this course covered the plastic behavior of materials)

1 Elasticity
2 Plasticity
3 Creep, relaxation behavior of materials
4 Fracture of materials (talk about the cracks)
5 Concrete and cement
6 Admixture
7 Aggregates
8 Fresh concrete
9 Early age concrete
10-12 Concrete deformation, strength and durability
13 Steel
14-15 Polymer and Wood
16 Pavement
reviews.comment_teaching: Attending the lessons will be helpful for gaining an insight into the course content as the notes may be too simplified (most of the contents are in point form). Professor Leung is a good teacher.
reviews.comment_grading:
The mean of the final exam is not released.
I got 100 in all assignments and around 100 for all labs(but only around 90 for lab 5)
Final grade: A-
reviews.comment_workload:
Quit light workload (6 assignments in total and most of them can be done by checking the notes and videos) .
Presentation is required for one of the lab.
Although there are many labs, your workload will be greatly reduced due to division of labor.
